title: What is the difference between a Mac and an iPad? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both are completely diffrent devices iPad run on iOs and Mac can run on macintosh or windows. iOs is mobile base operating system that can you use for gaming, web surfing , or for entertainment purposes, iOs can run some productivity apps like Microsoft excel, or Microsoft word. but Mac is completely different operating system in mac you can build apps, write codes, edit music or videos, in short its like comparing windows phone to windows PC. both run on windows OS. But there are still cant replace each other. hope this helps……. sorry for any grammatical mistake.
A Mac is a computer and iPad is a Tablet.
